name: ZooKeeper
description:
Checkout another game from our Publisher - Ultimate Games S.A.:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/979810/Grave_Keeper/Become the best ZooKeeper and build the greatest Zoo of all time!

You will be responsible for managing financial operations, managing human resources and, most important, taking care of animals. Make your Zoo popular - you will gain resources to breed rare animal species. You will also be able to build another Zoo in a different locationCreate new biomes for rare animals
Buy new lands, design and create biomes with environment appropriate for rare animal speciesTake care of the animals
Keeping your animals in good health will be very important for the success of your Zoo. Don't forget to give them food and meds when neededBuild and manage a great team
As a good leader, you should be aware that your employees are not only a big help for you, but also a great responsibility. You have to know how to manage your team in every situation and remember to pay them on timeTry keeping everyone happy
When you succeed as ZooKeeper nothing will stand in your way of achieving even more. Nobody will forget the zoo where one can see prehistoric species!
